title: Definitions
context: [ยง88E-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise: &ldquo;County&rdquo; means the counties of Hawaii, Kauai and Maui, and the city and county of Honolulu. &ldquo;Employee&rdquo; means a person who is eligible to participate in the employees&rsquo; retirement system of the State of Hawaii as defined in section 88-21. &ldquo;State&rdquo; means the State of Hawaii. [L Sp 1981 1st, c 7, pt of ยง1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
